meta.content: 2015 Baseball State Runner-Up, The Mission of Boswell Public School is to ensure that all Students are provided the educational opportunity to acquire the necessary knowledge and skills to be competent productive members of a global society.

div.button:
Severe Thunderstorm Warning
Click for more Information

div.p: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Choctaw County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Blossom, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Towson... Raymond Gary State Park... Huskey... Swink... Frogville... HAIL...1.00IN WIND...<50MPH
